title: Door stop and method of maintaining door in desired open position
fig_desc: The door stop 116 is similar to the door stop 16 shown in FIGS. 1-4, except that a different support member 150 and a different stop arm 122 are used to provide additional variable door holding force, as provided by the profile 130 Supplement of the door retention force
all_fig_descs: The door stop 116 is similar to the door stop 16 shown in FIGS. 1-4, except that a different support member 150 and a different stop arm 122 are used to provide additional variable door holding force, as provided by the profile 130 Supplement of the door retention force
